attributes.action: outlaw over 60's from complaining about pointless issues e.g the weather being too hot e.t.c
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: outlaw the over 60's complaining about pointless timewasting issues such as the weather and the fact that there are too many young people

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
